title: Stream: Washed Out – Paracosm
body:
Having helped coin and shape the chillwave genre, **Washed Out** aka **Ernest Greene** has begun to move away from the now dreaded term, moving into more experimental pop surroundings.

Featuring recent releases _It All Feels Right_ and _Don’t Give Up_, _**Parcosm**_, the sophomore record from Ernest Greene, is released on 13 August via Sub Pop (USA) / Weird World (UK). His sounds is still as current, and laid-back as ever, whilst pushing forward into more 80’s inspired territory. Stream Paracosm in full below, courtesy of [The Guardian](http://www.theguardian.com/music/musicblog/2013/aug/06/washed-out-paracosm-exclusive-stream).
